Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Provides for information concerning services for human trafficking victims
Summary: Provides for information concerning services for human trafficking victims in transit facilities operated by the metropolitan transportation authority.
LawCode: Add ยง1266-l, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to information concerning services for human trafficking victims
